items.title: Texas Just Approved the Largest Gas Power Project in U.S. History
items.summary: Texas’ environmental regulator this week issued the largest air pollution permit in the country to an enormous planned complex of gas power plants and data centers near the oilfields of the Permian Basin, according to an announcement from the project

items.title: The Slow and Steady Revival of Libya's Oil and Gas Sector
items.summary: Over a decade since the Arab Spring and the civil war that followed, Libya has opened its doors back up to oil and gas exploration. Despite the ongoing political uncertainty, with Libya divided between two leaderships, the North African country has e
